title: Designer Lighting, Washer/Dryer - In Unit, Wi-Fi, Valet Trash Services

Use this link for more information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 974 Sq.
Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and businesses, Summer Gate places you in the heart of Irving.
Our newly renovated apartments are convenient to the Irving Mall, North Lake College, and DFW International Airport.
Summer Gate offers something for everyone including 1 & 2 bedroom apartments.
Enjoy our new amenities and get a sneak peek of the good life at Summer Gate Apartments.
Call to schedule a tour today.
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $87.50 pet deposit (non-refundable) per pet.
There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.
